title: Chainlink's LINK Bounces 4% to Near $14 as Cryptos Rebound
contentSnippet: LINK could target $14.50 if momentum sustains, CoinDesk Research's analysis tool suggested.

title: Bitcoin Backwardation Returns, a Pattern That Often Marks Market Bottoms
contentSnippet: Futures prices for BTC are trading below spot prices, signaling "extreme fear," which can sometimes be read as a contrarian buy signal.

title: Sen. Warren Keeps Pressure on Trump Crypto Ties as Market Structure Bill Negotiated
contentSnippet: Senator Elizabeth Warren is maintaining political heat on President Trump's World Liberty Financial business interests in a letter to the Treasury and DOJ.

title: Google Releases Its Most Powerful AI Model, Gemini 3—Here's What You Need to Know
contentSnippet: Google's Gemini 3 Pro outperforms previous models across reasoning and multimodal benchmarks. It's available on AI Studio, but not the consumer Gemini app.

title: BTC Dipped to $90K! BTC wipes out 2025 Gains! Monad CoFounder Interview!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors are very red as btc briefly fell below $90k; btc -4% at $91,300; eth -5% at $3,050, bnb -2% at $915, sol -3% at $137. Icp (+9%), aster (+7%) and hype (+5%) led top movers. Crypto fear &

title: ETH falls into ‘buy zone,’ but volatility-averse traders take a wait-and-see approach
contentSnippet: Ether retests $3,000 as its Mayer Multiple falls below 1, entering a historical buy zone, while liquidity clusters signal short-term volatility ahead.

title: Stablecoin giant Tether backs Ledn, targets global crypto lending
contentSnippet: The investment from the stablecoin giant coincides with accelerating institutional interest and Wall Street participation in the crypto-backed loans sector.

title: Prediction Market Myriad Partners With Walrus Decentralized Data Storage Layer
contentSnippet: The partnership will see Myriad media stored on the developer platform, creating an immutable record with applications in DeFi and AI.

title: 'Crypto Winter Is Here' — Mark Yusko Explains What May Come Next
contentSnippet: In a recent Cointelegraph interview, Mark Yusko outlined the indicators pointing to a Bitcoin bear market and the forces shaping the road ahead.

title: The hijacking of the American dream: Why Bitcoin is for everyone — Author
contentSnippet: Cyclical financial crises and the steady growth of the money supply have eroded the ability to build capital and achieve social mobility.

title: Mt. Gox Moves Nearly $1 Billion in Bitcoin—Are More Repayments Imminent?
contentSnippet: Wallets belonging to defunct Bitcoin exchange Mt. Gox moved nearly $1 billion worth of the top crypto asset on Tuesday.

title: Cloudflare Outage Sends Shockwaves Through Crypto, Renewing Push for DePIN
contentSnippet: Some in the crypto world have called for DePIN to be more widely adopted to combat internet outage issues.

title: Bitcoin Gains Tuesday as Traditional Markets Slump in Rare Occurrence of Crypto Outperformance
contentSnippet: After plunging below $90,000 overnight, BTC has regained the $93,000 level in U.S. morning action.

title: U.S. Regulator OCC Clarifies How Banks Can Handle Network 'Gas Fees'
contentSnippet: The U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency explained to the national banks it oversees how they can hold crypto for paying gas fees.

title: Bitcoin Miner Canaan’s Stock Spikes After Q3 Revenue Rise, Even as BTC Falls
contentSnippet: Canaan’s stock jumped Tuesday after the Bitcoin mining firm reported a revenue spike, though Bitcoin fell to a seven-month low overnight.

title: Société Générale’s SG-FORGE Issues First Tokenized Bond in U.S.
contentSnippet: The bond uses Broadridge Financial Solutions' tokenization technology and runs on the Canton Network, a privacy-enabled blockchain infrastructure.

title: Bitcoin Sell-Off Likely 'Complete', Rally Into Year-End Still in Play: StanChart Analyst
contentSnippet: Standard Chartered’s Geoffrey Kendrick says bitcoin’s steep decline is part of a recurring pattern, with a rebound into year-end in his base case.

title: XLM Slips 3.2% to $0.25 as Altcoin Purge Continues
contentSnippet: Stellar drops from $0.2577 amid broad consolidation, but technical bounce from $0.248 signals buying interest remains intact.

title: Revolut Enlists Polygon for Stablecoin Remittances in UK and EEA
contentSnippet: Revolut customers in the UK and non-European Union EEA countries can do crypto remittances in USDC, USDT, and POL.

title: European Bank Revolut Taps Ethereum Network Polygon for Remittances, Stablecoin Payments
contentSnippet: Revolut is teaming with Ethereum scaling network Polygon to power crypto remittances and stablecoin payments.

title: New Wave of Solana ETFs Hits the Markets as Fidelity, Canary, and VanEck Roll Out
contentSnippet: Several Solana ETFs are launching across U.S. exchanges this week as asset managers test demand for products tied to altcoins and staking.

title: Institutions lean into crypto despite Bitcoin price slump
contentSnippet: Institutions across the globe are adopting cryptocurrency, offering new services and buying into blockchain tech, despite slumping Bitcoin price.

title: Retail vs. whales: Who actually drives the Santa rally?
contentSnippet: Is the Santa Rally driven by retail FOMO or whale-sized capital flows? Here’s what actually fuels December’s market surge in stocks and crypto.

title: Morning Minute: Aave Takes Aim at Banks, Fintechs with New Aave App
contentSnippet: Aave's latest Neobank app will have TradFi sweating, with more yield and more insurance protection than ever offered before.

title: Cloudflare outage hits multiple crypto websites, social media channels
contentSnippet: Many users reported not having access to websites, including Coinbase and Blockchain.com, and social media platforms after Cloudflare reported an “internal service degradation.”

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Brazil weighs tax on international crypto transfers as it aligns rules with CARF
contentSnippet: Brazil is reportedly considering imposing a tax on the use of cryptocurrency for international payments, as it aligns its rules with a global standard for sharing tax data.

title: Crypto private key theft is now big business: Here’s what to know
contentSnippet: Private key theft has become an automated, industrialized threat, highlighting the need for crypto users to remain vigilant, according to a report by GK8, a subsidiary of Galaxy Digital.

title: Bitcoin Drops to Seven-Month Low Under $90K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs have bled hundreds of millions as the market outlook deteriorates, driven by profit-taking and portfolio rebalancing.

title: トランプ一族、世界初のトークン化ホテル開発プロジェクト参画を発表
contentSnippet: トランプ・オーガニゼーションとDAR Globalが世界初のトークン化ホテル開発をモルディブで発表。ブロックチェーン技術を活用した新たな不動産投資モデルとして注目される。

title: Aave、米国で高利回り貯蓄アプリ「Aave App」開始へ　銀行入金・残高保護に対応
contentSnippet: DeFi大手Aaveが一般ユーザー向け貯蓄アプリ「Aave App」を米国で提供開始予定。最大100万ドルの残高保護、自動積立機能など、従来の銀行預金（平均0.4%）を上回る利便性を提供する。

title: 金商法移行で暗号資産市場はどう変わる？　JVCEA小田会長が業界の懸念に回答｜独自取材
contentSnippet: 暗号資産の金商法移行が最終局面を迎える中、日本暗号資産取引業協会(JVCEA)の小田玄紀代表理事がCoinPostの独自取材に応じた。開示規制は分散性の高い銘柄を対象外とし、取扱銘柄の大幅減少は想定されていないと明言。規制の枠組みを理解した上での革新を呼びかけた。分離課税実現には金商法移行が必要条件の一つであり、多くの政党が前向きに検討していると認識を示した。

title: マウントゴックス、ビットコイン1万BTCを動かす　弁済に進展か
contentSnippet: 破綻した暗号資産取引所マウントゴックスが11月18日、約1万608BTC（約1,470億円相当）を移動した。過去の大規模移動が債権者返済に先立って実施されてきた経緯から、今回も返済準備の可能性が指摘されている。同社は2024年7月から返済を開始しており、現在も約3万4,689BTCが未配布となっている。

title: 暗号学者アダム・バック、ビットコインの現実的な量子リスクは最短でも20年後　「備えは十分可能」
contentSnippet: 暗号学者アダム・バック氏が量子コンピュータによる脅威について「20-40年は安全」との見解を示した。一方、専門家の間では5-10年以内のリスクを指摘する声もある。

title: エルサルバドル、下落局面で約155億円相当のビットコイン押し目買い　保有高は7474BTC
contentSnippet: エルサルバドル政府が市場下落局面で約155億円相当のビットコインを追加購入し、保有高は7474BTCに達した。2025年1月に法定通貨地位を撤廃したものの、ブケレ政権は戦略的準備資産としての蓄積を継続している。

title: ヴィタリック、イーサリアムのプライバシー保護ツール「Kohaku」を紹介
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムのブテリン共同創設者がプライバシー保護ツール「Kohaku」を新たに紹介した。Railgun連携やゼロ知識証明で匿名性を強化する開発ロードマップを解説する。

title: CZ氏、6650億円の罰金返還なら米国に再投資と言及
contentSnippet: バイナンス創業者CZ氏が米司法省への約6650億円の罰金返還時に米国再投資を表明。トランプ大統領からの恩赦後、民主党議員からの腐敗疑惑批判に対し、感謝と慎重さのバランスを強調した発言として注目される。

title: Two Technical Signals Hinting at a Bitcoin Bear Market
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's bear market outlook firms as 80% of key on-chain metrics flash red, with derivatives and options traders betting on more downside.

title: 伝説投資家ドラッケンミラー、ブロックチェーン融資企業フィギュアの株式を120億円相当取得
contentSnippet: フィギュア株価上昇米ウォール街の伝説的なヘッジファンドマネージャーであるスタンリー・ドラッケンミラー氏が運営するデュケイン・キャピタルは11月15日、第3四半期の13F報告書で、ブロックチェーン融資企業フィギュア・テクノロジー・ソリューショ...

title: ソラナ保有企業フォワード、367億円相当SOLをコインベースへ入金　警戒高まる
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナを財務資産として保有するナスダック上場のフォワード・インダストリーズが約367億円相当のSOLをコインベース・プライムに移動させた。売却か社内再編成かは不明だ。
